amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part F of House Report 117-320 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 3, 5, and 10.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 2 comprised amendments numbered 3, 5, and 10, printed in Part F of House Report 117-320.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendments (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 198 - 219 (Roll no. 179).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A003) offered by Ms. Bonamici.

Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendments (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 198 - 219 (Roll no. 179).
